tool_description: Analyzes GPS coordinate sequences to determine movement patterns, territory boundaries, and migration routes from tracking data.

track_points.description: Array of latitude values for the GPS track

longitude_points.description: Array of longitude values corresponding to track_points

timestamps.description: Array of timestamp strings for each GPS point

analysis_type.description: Type of analysis: territory_mapping, migration_route, daily_movement, foraging_pattern

error_messages: Coordinate array mismatch: track_points, longitude_points, and timestamps must have the same length.
Insufficient data points: Minimum 3 GPS points required for analysis.
Invalid coordinates: Latitude values must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180.
Invalid analysis type: Must be one of [territory_mapping, migration_route, daily_movement, foraging_pattern].
Invalid timestamp format: All timestamps must be in ISO 8601 format.
usage: Provide arrays of track_points (latitudes), longitude_points, and corresponding timestamps with matching lengths. Specify analysis_type to determine the type of movement analysis performed.

movement_summary.description: Summary of movement patterns and key findings

territory_bounds.description: Boundary coordinates of identified territory or range

movement_speed.description: Average movement speed in kilometers per hour
